name: Car Mechanic Tycoon
description:
In Car Mechanic Tycoon you are the owner of a Car Mechanic company. Accept customer orders, hire employees and repair customers' cars.

Buy all parts and fluids and make sure that you keep sufficient stock.

Make sure your employees get enough sleep and upgrade their diploma if needed.

If your company gets big enough, you can join a Corporation or create one yourself. Communicate with other players and use the Corporation projects and buildings in your advantage to let your company grow even faster.

Car Mechanic Tycoon includes:
- Start and manage your own car garage business.
- Take care of your employees.
- Find the most profitable orders.
- Work together with other players in a Corporation.
- Keep an eye on your stock.
- Hire HR Managers and Technical Managers to automate some of your tasks.

Do you have what it takes to make your company the best?
